name: Fullday hiking Kho My Cave
description: Kho My Cave is named after Kho My village in Tung Vai commune, Quan Ba district. It is about 20km from Nam Dam village and Tam Son town. The cave is situated conviently by the paved road leading close to the cave mouth. Along the way, you can visit places that produce local specialties such as corn wine and honey in Thanh Van commune.
